    Exponential series MLE
    Exponential series
    Exponential series
    Weibull series MLE
    Maximum likelihood estimation functions for Weibull series systems from masked data.
    Weibull series
    Weibull series
    dexp_series_system()
    pdf for exponential series.
    dweibull_series()
    pdf for weibull series
    generate_relaxed_cand_C1()
    generate_relaxed_cand_C1
    hazard_exp_series_system()
    Hazard function for exponential series.
    hazard_weibull_series()
    Hazard function for weibull series.
    informative_masking_by_rank()
    informative_masking_by_rank
    kl_divergence_bernoulli()
    kl_divergence_bernoulli
    md_bernoulli_cand_C1_C2_C3()
    md_bernoulli_cand_C1_C2_C3
    md_bernoulli_cand_C1_kld()
    md_bernoulli_cand_C1_kld
    md_block_candidate_m3()
    md_block_candidate_m3
    md_cand_sampler()
    md_cand_sampler
    md_fim_exp_series_C1_C2_C3()
    Generates the observed information matrix (FIM) for an exponential series system with respect to parameter theta for masked data with candidate sets that approximately satisfy conditions C1, C2, and C3.
    md_loglike_exp_series_C1_C2_C3()
    Generates a log-likelihood for an exponential series system with respect to parameter theta for masked data with candidate sets that satisfy conditions C1, C2, and C3.
    md_loglike_weibull_series_C1_C2_C3()
    Log-likelihood generator for Weibull series system on masked data, where the masked data is in the form of right-censored system lifetimes and masked component cause of failure.
    md_mle_exp_series_C1_C2_C3()
    Maximum likelihood estimator for exponential series in which each component (or competing risk) is parameterized by a single rate parameter.
    md_mle_weibull_series_C1_C2_C3()
    Maximum likelihood estimator for Weibull series in which each component (or competing risk) is parameterized by a shape and scale parameter (k and lambda).
    md_score_exp_series_C1_C2_C3()
    Generates a score function for an exponential series system (or competing risks) with respect to parameter theta for masked component failure (or masked competing risks) with candidate sets (risks) that approximately satisfy conditions C1, C2, and C3.
    md_score_weibull_series_C1_C2_C3()
    Score function generator (gradient of the log-likelihood) for Weibull series system on masked data, where the masked data is in the form of right-censored system lifetimes and masked component cause of failure. Note that if the right censoring indicator variable delta is missing, we assume that all system lifetimes are observed.
    md_series_component_failure_probability_C1_C2()
    Component failure probability decorator.
    md_series_lifetime_right_censoring()
    Generates right-censored system failure times and right-censoring indicators for a series system with the given data frame of component lifetimes.
    param_weibull_series()
    The cumulative distribution function for Weibull series
    pexp_series_system()
    Cumulative distribution function for exponential series.
    pweibull_series()
    The cumulative distribution function for Weibull series
    qexp_series_system()
    Qunatile function for exponential series.
    qweibull_series()
    Quantile function (inverse of the cdf). By definition, the quantile p * 100% for a strictly monotonically increasing cdf F is the value t that satisfies F(t) - p = 0. We solve for t using newton's method.
    rexp_series_system()
    Survival function for exponential series.
    rweibull_series()
    Sampler for weibull series.
    survival_exp_series_system()
    Survival function for exponential series.
    survival_weibull_series()
    Survival function for weibull series
